name: pdf-autofill-extension
description: Cross-browser extension for form autofill using PDF OCR

scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:inject
scripts.build:chrome: npm run build && cp manifest.chrome.json manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build && cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && mkdir -p ../dist && zip -r ../dist/pdf-autofill-chrome.zip manifest.json popup.html styles dist icons -x 'node_modules/*' -x 'src/*'
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && mkdir -p ../dist && zip -r ../dist/pdf-autofill-firefox.zip manifest.json popup.html styles dist icons -x 'node_modules/*' -x 'src/*'
